sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO dms_tb_receipt_detail ( RECEIPT_ID, ORDER_ID, QUANTITY, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #receiptId#, #orderId#, #quantity#, 'U', NOW(), #modifyUser#, NOW(), #modifyUser# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.detail_id AS detailId, t.order_id AS orderId, t.quantity FROM dms_tb_receipt_detail t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.receipt_id = #receiptId# ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
